opis: Prodajemo jedinstvenu, dobro očuvanu, staru kamenu istarsku kuću iz 1900. godine s velikom okućnicom od 1.132 m2, sve građevinsko područje, nalazi se u središtu mjesta. Kuća posjeduje ručno rađenu kapelicu iz tog doba.Ima 110 m2 stambene površine na dva kata s unutarnjim drvenim stepenicama. Na međukatu je velika kupaonica sa odvojenim WC i hodnikom. Na prvom katu su tri velike spavaće sobe, a u prizemlju kuhinja i blagovaonica u jednom prostoru, dnevni boravak i veliki hodnik te spremište. Unutarnji dio kuće je renoviran 2016.g. Tradicionalna istarska gradnja iz tog doba prisutna je u svim prostorijama, kao i na okućnici koja je okružena zelenilom i raznim stablima voćaka (vinova loza, kruške, …). Prostrana vanjska kamena terasa ograđena je kamenim zidom i stoljetnim listopadnim stablima i pergolom od vinove loze. S druge strane kuće se nalazi zasebna garaža, zasebna kamena kućica s ognjištem i velika cisterna. Dvorište je ograđeno kamenim zidom. Više info na geofly.immobilien@gmail.com ili 095 829 1188 English!!! We are selling a unique, well-preserved, old Istrian stone house from 1900 with a large garden of 1,132 m2, all construction area, located in the center. The house has a handmade chapel from that time. It has 110 m2 of living space on two floors with internal wooden stairs. On the mezzanine floor is a large bathroom with separate toilet and hallway. On the first floor are three large bedrooms, and on the ground floor kitchen and dining room in one space, living room and large hallway and storage. The interior of the house was renovated in 2016. Traditional Istrian architecture from that time is present in all rooms, as well as in the garden which is surrounded by greenery and various fruit trees (vines, pears, (). The spacious outdoor stone terrace is surrounded by a stone wall and century-old deciduous trees and a vine pergola. On the other side of the house there is a separate garage, a separate stone house with a fireplace and a large cistern. The yard is surrounded by a stone wall.
